comments.author: kbrosnan@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 506748
Screenshot of the issue

Open any Bugzilla page.
Scroll down to the attachments section.
Scroll up and down at the default zoom level.

The thin lines that make up the outline of Attachments section appear and disappear.

The lines should be displayed.
